Body: I tried googling this issue but I cant seem to find an answer.A friend claimed I was "last seen" on whatsapp around 3 AM, while I was sound asleep at 1:40 AM, I received no new messages or even checked it since I was sound asleep.Anyone had this problem before or did I miss a certain setting? it's kind of bugging me at the moment. Could it perhaps be that when my phone charged to 100% that it blinks online for a sec and checks it in some subroutine? (Seems rather silly to me that something like that could be possible)Looking forward to hear if anyone else has or had this problem.
Title: Friend claims I was on whatsapp at 3 AM, but I was asleep for 2 hours already

history.Text: I tried googling this issue but I cant seem to find an answer.A friend claimed I was "last seen" on whatsapp around 3 AM, while I was sound asleep at 1:40 AM, I received no new messages or even checked it since I was sound asleep.Anyone had this problem before or did I miss a certain setting? it's kind of bugging me at the moment. Could it perhaps be that when my phone charged to 100% that it blinks online for a sec and checks it in some subroutine? (Seems rather silly to me that something like that could be possible)Looking forward to hear if anyone else has or had this problem.
Friend claims I was on whatsapp at 3 AM, but I was asleep for 2 hours already
